name: DispatchSemaphore
desc: An object that controls access to a resource across multiple execution contexts through use of a traditional counting semaphore.

items.name: init(value: Int)
items.desc: Creates new counting semaphore with an initial value.

items.name: func wait()
items.desc: Waits for, or decrements, a semaphore.

items.name: func wait(timeout: DispatchTime) -> DispatchTimeoutResult
items.desc: Waits for, or decrements, a semaphore.

items.name: func wait(wallTimeout: DispatchWallTime) -> DispatchTimeoutResult
items.desc: Waits for, or decrements, a semaphore.
